Description:
Technical concepts and software issues that IT managers require to plan, operate and maintain computer-based systems and software assets. The book also considers some core issues in software testing.


This book is basically these two books combined into one:

Managing the Software Enterprise : Software Engineering and Information Systems in Context - Chapters 1-11
Foundation of Software Testing - Chapters 1-4

NOTE: If you can afford it then please consider the purchase of this book before downloading this torrent so that the authors get their royalties, our fight is against DRM(Digital Restrictions Management) that the publishers use and not against the authors who worked hard to write these books.
Academic books should NEVER have DRM, often it is not until after we have enrolled in a course/paper that we are informed we have to use DRM course materials, that's why I crack DRM and share academic books when DRM is forced on me, also please help seed for future students
